entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 3:12PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Water Levels and Local Runoff Possible Next Week... entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 1:43PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water Levels Likely Through This Week... Warm temperatures across the eastern Interior, combined with a much above normal snowpack over higher elevations, is causing a significant increase in snowmelt.
